text: Woh raat ko din mein aur din ko raat mein dakhil kerta hai aur aftab aur mahtab ko ussi ney kaam mein laga diya hai. Her aik miyaad-e-moyyan per chal raha hai. Yehi hai Allah tum sab ka palney wala ussi ki saltanat hai. Jinhen tum iss kay siwa pukar rahey ho woh to khajoor ki guthli kay chilkay kay bhi malik nahi
